AddContacts.description: Add the specified contacts during the state's start

RemoveContacts.description: Remove the specified contacts during the state's start

AddContactsAfter.description: Add the specified contacts during the state's teardown

RemoveContactsAfter.description: Remove the specified contacts during the state's teardown

AddCollisions.description: Add the specified collisions during the state's start

RemoveCollisions.description: Remove the specified collisions during the state's start

AddCollisionsAfter.description: Add the specified collisions during the state's teardown

RemoveCollisionsAfter.description: Remove the specified collisions during the state's teardown

oneOf.description: If true, remove all posture tasks at the state's start.
Keys are robots' names, value is a boolean indicating whether the posture taks is removed.

constraints.description:
Constraints that will be added when the state starts and removed when the state stops.
Keys are used to identify the constraints in the description.

tasks.description:
Tasks that will be added when the state starts and removed when the state stops.
Keys are the name of the tasks and values are MetaTask objects.
